net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AttackEditor_upgradeAttacks
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
To be executed against a token in the event its AE1 attacks require some udpate action
This macro will compare the current Token's AE1 attack version with AE1 and perform upgraded
for each version differential, should it be required. This allows this macro to organically
grow as new model versions evolve.
